com.foreach.across.core.context.bootstrap

Interface BootstrapApplicationContextFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationConfigBootstrapApplicationContextFactory, WebBootstrapApplicationContextFactory

    public interface BootstrapApplicationContextFactory
    In charge of creating the ApplicationContext and loading all the beans.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext()
      Create a new ApplicationContext instance that support Across context behavior.
      org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext parentApplicationContext)
      Create the Spring ApplicationContext for the root of the AcrossContext.
      org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder parentContext)
      Create the Spring ApplicationContext for a particular AcrossModule.
      void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
      Loads beans and definitions in the root ApplicationContext.
      void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across, ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig, AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
      Loads beans and definitions in the module ApplicationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • createApplicationContext

        org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext()
        Create a new ApplicationContext instance that support Across context behavior.
        Returns:
        Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AbstractApplicationContext.

      • createApplicationContext

        org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across,
                                                                                      org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext parentApplicationContext)
        Create the Spring ApplicationContext for the root of the AcrossContext. Optionally a parent ApplicationContext can be specified and a map of singletons that are guaranteed to be available when the ApplicationContext has been created.
        Parameters:
        across - AcrossContext being created.
        parentApplicationContext - Parent ApplicationContext, can be null.
        Returns:
        Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AbstractApplicationContext.

      • createApplicationContext

        org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext createApplicationContext(AcrossContext across,
                                                                                      ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig,
                                                                                      AcrossApplicationContextHolder parentContext)
        Create the Spring ApplicationContext for a particular AcrossModule.
        Parameters:
        across - AcrossContext being loaded.
        moduleBootstrapConfig - Bootstrap configuration of the AcrossModule being created.
        parentContext - Contains the parent context.
        Returns:
        Spring ApplicationContext instance implementing AbstractApplicationContext.

      • loadApplicationContext

        void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across,
                          AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
        Loads beans and definitions in the root ApplicationContext.
        Parameters:
        across - AcrossContext being loaded.
        context - Contains the root Spring ApplicationContext.

      • loadApplicationContext

        void loadApplicationContext(AcrossContext across,
                          ModuleBootstrapConfig moduleBootstrapConfig,
                          AcrossApplicationContextHolder context)
        Loads beans and definitions in the module ApplicationContext.
        Parameters:
        across - AcrossContext being loaded.
        moduleBootstrapConfig - Bootstrap configuration of the AcrossModule being loaded.
        context - Contains the Spring ApplicationContext for the module.
